title: Banks as Vital Infrastructure for Rural Communities of the West
content: For release on delivery  8:15 p.m. EST (5:15 p.m. PST)  December 5, 2018    Banks as Vital Infrastructure for Rural Communities of the West         Remarks by     Randal K. Quarles     Vice Chairman for Supervision     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Stanford Institute for Economic Policy Research  Stanford University    Stanford, California                 December 5, 2018
